sn48.49:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
sn48.49:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmatā piṇḍolabhāradvājena aññā byākatā hoti:
sn48.49:4.4: “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī”ti.
sn48.49:4.5: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn48.49:4.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn48.49:5.2: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmīti.
sn48.49:5.3: Kiṃ nu kho, bhante, atthavasaṃ sampassamānena āyasmatā piṇḍolabhāradvājena aññā byākatā:
sn48.49:5.4: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmī”ti?
sn48.49:6.1: “Tiṇṇannaṃ kho, bhikkhave, indriyānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā piṇḍolabhāradvājena bhikkhunā aññā byākatā:
sn48.49:6.2: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmīti.
sn48.49:6.5: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇannaṃ indriyānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā piṇḍolabhāradvājena bhikkhunā aññā byākatā:
sn48.49:6.6: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmīti.
sn48.49:6.11: ‘Jātijarāmaraṇaṃ khayan’ti kho, bhikkhave, sampassamānena piṇḍolabhāradvājena bhikkhunā aññā byākatā:
sn48.49:6.12: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmī”ti.
